name: Document.DOMContentLoaded_event
description: The DOMContentLoaded event fires when the initial HTML document has been completely loaded and parsed, without waiting for stylesheets, images, and subframes to finish loading.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'DOMContentLoaded' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.

refs.description: The definition of 'DOMContentLoaded' in the 'HTML5' specification.
